publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-145 Margo MacDonald: Memorandum of Understandingâ€”That the Parliament deprecates the action taken by the Prime Minister in signing an agreement of understanding with Libya regarding the transfer of prisoners without prior consultation with the Scottish government, as set out in the Memorandum of Understanding and Supplementary Agreements between the UK Government and the Scottish Ministers.
S3M-145 Memorandum of Understanding (lodged on 8 June 2007) Christine Grahame*
